name: Abminable am
description: Abominable Rams are large, 8-foot-tall creatures that are built like a horse but have 6 legs and are covered in bright white scales. Their heads are topped with two massive ramâ€™s horns. They are found in snowy regions where they can hide in snow drifts to ambush unwary prey. Its medium size (2 inches) Navidus Crystal is found in its belly.

actions.name: Ram
actions.description: The Crocodile chopms down with jaws powerful enough to crush a person's body.

actions.name: Drowning Drag
actions.modifierNote: Requires a nearby body of water
actions.description: The Crocodile grabs you and drags you into the water. It grapples you via an opposed Tough check. If the crocodile succeeds, then you take 3 Harm and are then dragged into the water to cause 1 Harm (ignoring armor) for every round that you are held under the water.
